welcome_message_body: Welcome to Salmon Creek, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and warm hospitality. We are excited to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Portland International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse is primarily used for Alaska Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse is primarily used for Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: This concourse is primarily used for United Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: This concourse is primarily used for American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Troutdale Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Troutdale Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Portland Airport primarily serves smaller regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection in certain areas.
